Score - Class in game
Score manages the player's points during the game.
Score() - Constructor for class game.Score
Constructs a new Score with an initial value of zero.
setBackgroundImage(String) - Method in class game.GameView
Changes the background image.
setPlayer(Player) - Method in class game.GameView
Sets a new player to follow.
shoot() - Method in class game.Player
Shoots a bullet if the player has a gun and is able to shoot.

Skeleton - Class in game
Skeleton is an enemy character that follows the player and shoots projectiles.
Skeleton(World, Player, Health) - Constructor for class game.Skeleton
Constructs a Skeleton enemy.
Sound - Class in game
Sound loads and manages all the audio used in the game.

Spike - Class in game
Spike is a static hazard that damages the player on contact.
Spike(World, Health) - Constructor for class game.Spike
Constructs a Spike object.
startGame() - Method in class game.Game
Starts the game by loading Level 1, setting up the view, and starting the game world.
stopMoving() - Method in class game.Player
Stops the player from moving.
SuperZombie - Class in game
SuperZombie is a stronger enemy that patrols and shoots at the player.

Constructs a SuperZombie enemy.
